Title: Indian buyers seek June LNG cargoes; Oman LNG offers one cargo loading in June
Description: India’s state-owned firms BPCL and Gail are seeking a total of three cargoes for delivery in June through two separate tenders closing tomorrow, while Oman LNG is offering a cargo that will load on June 14-16 at its 10.9 mtpa Qalhat LNG. Oman LNG’s tender closes on May 26.
Author: CK

Title: Snohvit LNG’s restart delayed further to later this week; three ships wait outside terminal
Description: Norway’s Equinor has pushed back the restart of its 4.2 mtpa Snohvit LNG plant yet again, with the firm now expecting the shuttered export facility to resume operations a few days later than planned on May 27.
Author: CK
